# copy this loadstring for easy use
loadstring(game:HttpGet("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DANdush10/roblox/refs/heads/main/LumberTycoon2/LumberTycoon2.lua"))()
-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394

local args = {
    [1] = {
        ["Character"] = workspace.Stores.WoodRUs.Thom,
        ["Name"] = "Thom",
        ["ID"] = 10,
        ["Dialog"] = workspace.Stores.WoodRUs.Thom.Dialog
    },
    [2] = "Initiate"
}

game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").NPCDialog.PlayerChatted:InvokeServer(unpack(args))

task.wait(2)

-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394

game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").NPCDialog.PlayerChatted:InvokeServer(unpack(args))

task.wait(2)
